item.title: Hello Mathjax and Highlight.js
item.description:
$$\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}}$$

Wait Wait wait….Wait lets see what some syntax highlighting looks like! And a bit of extra stuff in here

<section id="main">
  <div>
    <h1 id="title">{{ .Title }}</h1>
    {{ range .Data.Pages }}
      {{ .Render "summary"}}
    {{ end }}
  </div>
</section>

# Makefile

BUILDDIR      = _build
EXTRAS       ?= $(BUILDDIR)/extras

.PHONY: main clean

main:
	@echo "Building main facility..."
	build_main $(BUILDDIR)

clean:
	rm -rf $(BUILDDIR)/*

And that is that!
